node.contents: EDIT. I am sure that there is a better way, but as a workaround you can call some method on some bean:

elements.contents: @Component("appVariablesHolder") public class AppVariablesHolder { @Value("${role.rolename}") private String someRole; public String getSomeRole() { return this.someRole; } } @PreAuthorize("hasRole(@appVariablesHolder.getSomeRole())") public void method() {}

units.rawText: @Component("appVariablesHolder") public class AppVariablesHolder { @Value("${role.rolename}") private String someRole; public String getSomeRole() { return this.someRole; } } @PreAuthorize("hasRole(@appVariablesHolder.getSomeRole())") public void method() {}
